mapper.select: SELECT autoid, csbvcode as invoiceId, cdemandcode as orderDetailCode, iorderrowno AS orderNumber, irowno, iquantity as fquantity, cinvcode, cinvname, cdepname, dverifysystime, dcreatesystime, dArverifydate as darverifierdate, ccusCode, ccusName, dArverifydate as dmonth FROM SaleBillVouchZT inner join SaleBillVouchZW on SaleBillVouchZT.sbvid=SaleBillVouchZW.sbvid WHERE cdemandcode is not null and (cVouchType = 26 OR cVouchType = 27) AND ( 1 = 1 AND ((dArverifydate >= #{startDate}) AND (dArverifydate <= #{endDate}))) ;

SELECT autoid, csbvcode as invoiceId, cdemandcode as orderDetailCode, iorderrowno AS orderNumber, irowno, iquantity as fquantity, cinvcode, cinvname, iNatMoney as income, dverifysystime, dcreatesystime, dArverifydate as darverifierdate, cdepname, ccusCode, ccusName, dArverifydate as dmonth FROM SaleBillVouchZT inner join SaleBillVouchZW on SaleBillVouchZT.sbvid=SaleBillVouchZW.sbvid WHERE cdemandcode is not null and (cVouchType = 26 OR cVouchType = 27) AND ( 1 = 1 AND ((dArverifydate >= #{startDate}) AND (dArverifydate <= #{endDate}))) ;

SELECT autoid, csbvcode as invoiceId, SaleBillVouchZW.csocode as orderDetailCode, SaleBillVouchZW.iorderrowno AS orderNumber, iquantity as fquantity, cinvcode, cinvname, irowno, dverifysystime, dcreatesystime, dArverifydate as darverifierdate, cdepname, ccusCode, ccusName, dArverifydate as dmonth FROM SaleBillVouchZT inner join SaleBillVouchZW on SaleBillVouchZT.sbvid=SaleBillVouchZW.sbvid WHERE SaleBillVouchZW.csocode is not null and (cVouchType = 26 OR cVouchType = 27) AND ( 1 = 1 AND ((dArverifydate >= #{startDate}) AND (dArverifydate <= #{endDate}))) ;

SELECT SaleBillVouchZW.csocode as orderDetailCode, SaleBillVouchZW.iorderrowno AS orderNumber, iquantity as fquantity, cinvcode, ddate as dmonth FROM SaleBillVouchZT inner join SaleBillVouchZW on SaleBillVouchZT.sbvid=SaleBillVouchZW.sbvid WHERE (cVouchType = 26 OR cVouchType = 27) AND ( 1 = 1 AND ((ddate >= #{startDate}) AND (ddate <= #{endDate}))) AND ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '';

SELECT autoid, ccode as invoiceId, idemandseq AS orderNumber, irowno, cdemandcode AS orderDetailCode, cinvcode, cinvname, cdepname, fquantity, dverifysystime, dcreatesystime, darverifierdate, ccusCode, darverifierdate as dmonth FROM v_ex_invoicelist WHERE iverifystate=2 and fquantity>0 and cdemandcode is not null AND darverifierdate >= #{startDate} AND darverifierdate <= #{endDate}
select iTaxPrice as materialCost from PO_Podetails where csocode = #{orderCode} AND irowno=#{orderNumber} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode}

SELECT top 1 dverifydate FROM Sales_FHD_T INNER JOIN Sales_FHD_W ON Sales_FHD_T.dlid = Sales_FHD_W.dlid LEFT JOIN (SELECT chdefine1 AS chdefine1, dlid AS keyextend_t_dlid_dispatchlist_extradefine_dlid FROM dispatchlist_extradefine) extend_t_dlid_dispatchlist_extradefine ON keyextend_t_dlid_dispatchlist_extradefine_dlid = sales_fhd_t.dlid WHERE ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '' AND ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '' and Sales_FHD_T.csocode=#{orderDetilCode} and cinvcode=#{cInvCode} and idemandseq=#{orderNumber} and ccuscode=#{customerCode}

SELECT top 1 dverifydate FROM Sales_FHD_T INNER JOIN Sales_FHD_W ON Sales_FHD_T.dlid = Sales_FHD_W.dlid LEFT JOIN (SELECT
idlsid AS keyextend_b_idlsid_dispatchlists_extradefine_idlsid FROM dispatchlists_extradefine) extend_b_idlsid_dispatchlists_extradefine ON keyextend_b_idlsid_dispatchlists_extradefine_idlsid = sales_fhd_w.idlsid LEFT JOIN (SELECT cidefine1 AS extend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory_cidefine1, cinvdefine2 AS extend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory_cinvdefine2, iinvweight AS extend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory_iinvweight, fgrossw AS extend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory_fgrossw, cinvcode AS keyextend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory_cinvcode FROM v_inventory) extend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory ON keyextend_b_cinvcode_v_inventory_cinvcode = sales_fhd_w.cinvcode WHERE ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '' AND ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '' and Sales_FHD_T.csocode=#{orderDetilCode} and cinvcode=#{cInvCode} and idemandseq=#{orderNumber} and ccuscode=#{customerCode}

SELECT top 1 dverifydate FROM Sales_FHD_T INNER JOIN Sales_FHD_W ON Sales_FHD_T.dlid = Sales_FHD_W.dlid WHERE ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '' AND ISNULL (cchildcode, '') = '' and cinvcode=#{cInvCode} and idemandseq=#{orderNumber} and ccuscode=#{customerCode}

select max(dVouchDate) as dvd from AR_CloseList where cVouchID in( SELECT distinct(cVouchID) FROM Ar_DetailCust_V a WHERE (iflag <= 2 OR iflag = 5) AND cCoVouchType != cProcStyle AND iFlag != 1 AND cProcStyle != '9C' AND cProcStyle != '9M' AND cProcStyle != 'TP' AND (cProcStyle != 'XJ' OR iFlag = 5) AND ((cProcStyle = 'BZ'AND ((cSign = 'Z'AND iDAmount < 0) OR (cSign = 'F' AND iDAmount > 0))) OR cProcStyle != 'BZ') AND ( cFlag = 'AR'OR a.cBusType = '代理进口') AND cCoVouchID=#{invoiceId} AND cCoVouchID != cVouchID )

SELECT sum(imoney) as mn FROM zpurpoheader WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN zpurpotail WITH (nolock) ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid LEFT JOIN (SELECT chdefine1 AS chdefine1, poid AS keyextend_t_poid_po_pomain_extradefine_poid FROM po_pomain_extradefine) extend_t_poid_po_pomain_extradefine ON keyextend_t_poid_po_pomain_extradefine_poid = zpurpoheader.poid where csocode = #{orderCode} AND irowno=#{orderNumber} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode}

SELECT sum(inatunitprice) as mn FROM zpurpoheader WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN zpurpotail WITH (nolock) ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode = #{orderCode} AND irowno=#{orderNumber} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode}

SELECT sum(iprice)/sum(iquantity) FROM om_mshead INNER JOIN om_msbody ON om_mshead.msid = om_msbody.msid WHERE cmocode= ( SELECT top 1 ccode FROM om_mohead INNER JOIN om_mobody ON om_mohead.moid = om_mobody.moid WHERE csocode=#{orderCode} and irowno=#{orderNumber} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode} and iProductType = 0 ) and cinvcode=#{cinvcode}

SELECT sum(iprice)/sum(iquantity) FROM om_mshead INNER JOIN om_msbody ON om_mshead.msid = om_msbody.msid WHERE cmocode= ( SELECT top 1 ccode FROM om_mohead INNER JOIN om_mobody ON om_mohead.moid = om_mobody.moid WHERE csocode=#{orderCode} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode} and iProductType = 0 ) and cinvcode=#{cinvcode}
SELECT sum(inatunitprice) as mn FROM zpurpoheader WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN zpurpotail WITH (nolock) ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode = #{orderCode} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode}
SELECT top 1 inatunitprice as mn FROM zpurpoheader WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN zpurpotail WITH (nolock) ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where cinvcode=#{cinvcode}
SELECT sum(inatunitprice) as mn FROM zpurpoheader WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN zpurpotail WITH (nolock) ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode = #{orderCode} AND cinvcode=#{cinvcode}
SELECT sum(inatunitprice) as mn FROM zpurpoheader WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN zpurpotail WITH (nolock) ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode like #{orderCode} AND cinvcode=#{cinvcode}

SELECT sum(inatunitprice) as matericalCost_unit, csocode as orderDetailCode FROM zpurpoheader INNER JOIN zpurpotail ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode like #{orderCode} AND irowno=#{orderNumber} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode} group by csocode
SELECT cvencode,cvenname FROM zpurpoheader INNER JOIN zpurpotail ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode = #{orderCode} AND irowno=#{orderNumber} group by cvencode,cvenname
SELECT cvencode,cvenname FROM zpurpoheader INNER JOIN zpurpotail ON zpurpoheader.poid = zpurpotail.poid where csocode like #{orderCode} AND irowno=#{orderNumber} group by cvencode,cvenname

select a.BomId, b.InvCode,a.BaseQtyN from bom_opcomponent a inner join bas_part b on a.ComponentId=b.PartId where a.bomid in
#{item}

select sum(t1.iFinAmo/W.iQua) as mc from Ca_AmoctRevert as t1 left join ca_comps W on t1.cppid=W.cppid and t1.cbatch=W.cbatch and t1.iperiod=W.iperiod inner join ca_batchmap t3 on t1.cppid=t3.irealcoid and t1.cbatch = t3.cbatch where W.iQua!=0 AND cMOCode = #{orderCode} AND iMOSubSN = #{orderNumber} and t1.cAmoType = #{cAmoType}

select sum(t1.iFinAmo/W.iQua) as mc from Ca_AmoctRevert as t1 left join ca_comps W on t1.cppid=W.cppid and t1.cbatch=W.cbatch and t1.iperiod=W.iperiod inner join ca_batchmap t3 on t1.cppid=t3.irealcoid and t1.cbatch = t3.cbatch where W.iQua!=0 AND cMOCode = #{orderCode} AND iMOSubSN = #{orderNumber} and t1.cAmoType = #{cAmoType} and t1.iPeriod=#{dmonth}

select top 1 sum(t1.iFinAmo/W.iQua) as mc from Ca_AmoctRevert as t1 left join ca_comps W on t1.cppid=W.cppid and t1.cbatch=W.cbatch and t1.iperiod=W.iperiod inner join ca_batchmap t3 on t1.cppid=t3.irealcoid and t1.cbatch = t3.cbatch where W.iQua!=0 AND cMOCode = #{orderCode} AND iMOSubSN = #{orderNumber} and t1.cAmoType = #{cAmoType} and t1.iPeriod <=#{dmonth} group by t1.iPeriod order by t1.iPeriod desc

select sum(t1.iFinAmo/t1.iFinOutPut) from Ca_AmoctRevert as t1 left join ca_comps W on t1.cppid=W.cppid and t1.cbatch=W.cbatch and t1.iperiod=W.iperiod inner join ca_batchmap t3 on t1.cppid=t3.irealcoid and t1.cbatch = t3.cbatch where cMOCode = #{orderCode} AND iMOSubSN = #{orderNumber} and t1.cAmoType = #{cAmoType} and w.iQua!=0 and t1.iperiod = #{dmonth};

select sum(t1.iFinAmo/t1.iFinOutPut) from Ca_AmoctRevert as t1 left join ca_comps W on t1.cppid=W.cppid and t1.cbatch=W.cbatch and t1.iperiod=W.iperiod inner join ca_batchmap t3 on t1.cppid=t3.irealcoid and t1.cbatch = t3.cbatch where cMOCode = #{orderCode} AND iMOSubSN = #{orderNumber} and t1.cAmoType = #{cAmoType} and w.iQua!=0

select top 1 a.BomId from bom_bom A inner join bom_parent B on A.BomId = B.BomId inner join bas_part C on B.ParentId = C.PartId inner join inventory D on C.InvCode = D.cInvCode left join ComputationUnit e on d.cComUnitCode = e.cComUnitCode WHERE c.InvCode=#{cinvcode} and VersionDesc='订单BOM'

SELECT sum(inatmoney) as im FROM SaleBillVouchZT INNER JOIN SaleBillVouchZW ON SaleBillVouchZT.sbvid = SaleBillVouchZW.sbvid WHERE (cVouchType = 26 OR cVouchType = 27) and csbvcode=#{csbvcode} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode} and SaleBillVouchZW.csocode=#{cordercode} and irowno=#{irowno} and iorderrowno=#{iorderrowno} and autoid=#{autoid}

SELECT sum(inatmoney) as im FROM SaleBillVouchZT INNER JOIN SaleBillVouchZW ON SaleBillVouchZT.sbvid = SaleBillVouchZW.sbvid WHERE autoid=#{autoid} and (cVouchType = 26 OR cVouchType = 27) and csbvcode=#{csbvcode} and cinvcode=#{cinvcode} and SaleBillVouchZW.csocode=#{cordercode} and iorderrowno=#{iorderrowno} and irowno is null
